channel.title: [PI] Turmoil glitch
channel.description:
The glitch is, when a player turns on turmoil it always returns your prayer points to 94. so if you only have 1 prayer point left you can turn on turmoil and your back up to 94, or if your 95+ prayer points you get lowered to 94. I'm using MTP v1 as a base for this.
Id be very thankful if anyone could find a fix for this while I finish fixing pvp statuettes. :]

item.title: [PI] Turmoil glitch
item.dc:creator: @KrypitcRc KrypitcRc
item.description:
@KrypitcRc wrote:

[quote=“Mariokillu, post:6, topic:375690”]Easy fix lol.

Go into src\server\model\players\packets and then open ClickingButtons.java and search

case 70094:

Below that, you should see

c.playerLevel[5] = 95;

All you got to do it delete that line then it should work.[/quote]

Thanks, Saved me some time :]

I was thinking it might be a 95 and it was just depleting the 95th prayer point instantly, looks like I was right x]

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Turmoil glitch
item.dc:creator: @Mariokillu Mariokillu
item.description:
@Mariokillu wrote:

Easy fix lol.

Go into src\server\model\players\packets and then open ClickingButtons.java and search

case 70094:

Below that, you should see

c.playerLevel[5] = 95;

All you got to do it delete that line then it should work.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Turmoil glitch
item.dc:creator: @KrypitcRc KrypitcRc
item.description:
@KrypitcRc wrote:

4 2 0:

Just go through your client.java or maybe even clickingmost.java and ctrl + f - for turmoil. See if any of the code shows a 94 anywhere. You just gotta learn every single bit of your code. It helps.

Ya I was afraid I’d have to that lol, MTP has allot of glitches >.>

Read full topic
